meanings.definition: The number that is one more than sixteen and one less than eighteen.
meanings.sent1: I counted up to seventeen marbles in the jar.
meanings.sent2: She turned seventeen last week and had a fun birthday party.
meanings.sent3: Why was the math book sad? Because it had too many problems, even up to seventeen!
meanings.sent4: The sun set behind the mountains, painting the sky with seventeen shades of orange.
meanings.sent5: The teacher asked the students to count to seventeen in Spanish to practice their numbers.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that is seventeen years old.
meanings.sent1: My cousin is a seventeen and loves playing basketball.
meanings.sent2: The movie's main character is a seventeen who goes on a thrilling adventure.
meanings.sent3: Why did the clock go to therapy? It had too much stress being a seventeen!
meanings.sent4: The old tree in the backyard stood tall and wise, witnessing the passing of seventeen seasons.
meanings.sent5: The little puppy wagged its tail happily, unaware that it was already a seventeen in dog years.
